recipe_summary: Cook pasta; prepare a cheese sauce. Combine, top with breadcrumbs, and bake until golden and bubbly.
Cook spaghetti; fry pancetta/bacon until crisp. Whisk eggs, Pecorino, and pepper; toss hot pasta and bacon with egg mixture off heat to create a creamy sauce.
Mash ripe avocados. Gently mix in lime juice, diced onion, cilantro, jalapeño (optional), and salt.
Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla to create a custard. Dip bread slices in the custard and pan-fry in butter until golden brown.
Sauté beef strips, onions, and mushrooms; simmer in beef broth. Stir in sour cream just before serving over egg noodles.
Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, and melted butter for batter. Pour spoonfuls onto a hot griddle and cook until golden.
Layer slices of fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and fresh basil leaves. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and season; optionally add balsamic glaze.
Brown ground beef; stir in taco seasoning and water, then simmer until thickened. Serve in taco shells or tortillas with desired toppings.
Marinate chicken pieces, then simmer them in a rich, buttery tomato-cream gravy infused with fenugreek leaves. Serve with flatbread or rice.
Sauté blanched spinach purée with garlic, ginger, and aromatic spices. Gently fold in cubes of Indian cottage cheese (paneer) and simmer briefly.
Marinate meat (or vegetables) with yogurt and spices; partially cook fragrant basmati rice with whole spices. Layer the meat/veg and rice, then steam together until fully cooked and aromatic.
Prepare a savory filling of spiced potatoes and peas (or minced meat). Encase the filling in pastry dough shaped into cones and deep-fry until golden and crisp.
Make small balls from a dough of milk solids (khoya or milk powder) and a little flour; deep-fry them until golden brown. Soak the fried balls in a warm, cardamom-scented sugar syrup.

Roast or grill a whole large eggplant over an open flame or under a broiler until the skin is charred and the flesh is soft. Mash the smoky pulp and sauté with chopped onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and spices.
